text: evarkal (marumaiyaip purakkanittum viraivil aliyum) ivvalkkaiyai virumpukirarkalo, avarkalil nam natiyavarkalukku nam natuvatai (ivvulakileye) viraintu kotuttu vituvom; pinnaro a(ttakaiya)varukkaka, nam jahanna(m naraka)ttaic cittappatutti vaittirukkirom; atil avar palikkappattavarakavum capikkappattavarakavum nulaivar
